mapper.select: SELECT info_eval_by_institution_code , info_eval_by_institution_sort , info_eval_by_institution_type , info_eval_by_institution_contents , info_eval_by_institution_effective_date , left(info_eval_by_institution_insert_date,10) AS infoEvalByInstitutionInsertDate FROM info_eval_by_institution ORDER BY infoEvalByInstitutionInsertDate

SELECT info_eval_by_association_code , info_eval_by_association_sort , info_eval_by_association_type , info_eval_by_association_contents , info_eval_by_association_effective_date , left(info_eval_by_association_insert_date,10) AS infoEvalByAssociationInsertDate FROM info_eval_by_association ORDER BY infoEvalByAssociationInsertDate
